item.title: [ERI1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack E101
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 17, 07:00 - 14:00 UTC

Feb 7, 04:38 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Bare metal offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 17/03/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 17/03/2025 14:00 UTC
Service impact : Each server in rack E101 will be unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, our teams will move servers from rack E101 to racks E103 and E105.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [BHS1][Bare Metal Cloud] - Rack T02F26
item.description:
Mar 2, 03:48 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that we had an incident on Bare Metal Cloud offer in the rack T02F26.
This incident has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 02/03/2025 03:31 UTC
End time : 02/03/2025 03:35 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Servers in rack T02F26 were temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers were temporarily unable to access and use their servers located in the specified rack.
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a network equipment issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.
